munge:munge-fork

Full name:

org.sonatype.plugins:munge-maven-plugin:1.0:munge-fork

Description:

Forks a new build that compiles and runs tests using the munged source in place of the original.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Invokes the execution of the lifecycle phase prepare-package prior to executing itself.
  • Executes in its own lifecycle: munge.

Parameters

(no parameters)
